reapack.desc: Interactive ReaScript (iReaScript)

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: Initial release

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: + enhance formatting of arrays containing nil values + implement Delete key + implement word movement keys (Shift+Left and Shift+Right) + imply the return statement by default + limit maximum depth when formatting tables + protect against overriding of built-in variables

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: + added autocompletion with Tab key + added PageUp/PageDown keys to scroll faster + fix formatting of multiline text chunks + implement clipboard read/write with Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V (works best on OS X) + preserve current input and history on .clear + protect against invalid access on reaper/gfx tables (thanks to X-Raym) + set global `_` variable to the first return value of last statement + support multi-line statements

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: + autocomplete partial matches + don't execute empty code input (v0.3 regression) + enhance formatting of string values + fix input of tildes + increase maximum buffer size to 2048 lines + limit maximum size of tables values when formatting + optimize layout by only computing new or modified text segments + preserve current input when using Ctrl+L shortcut + prevent cursor positon from affecting text position + remove reaper/gfx proxy variable workaround (requires REAPER v5.23 [t=177319]) + rewrite drawing & scrolling code + wait at least one second before blinking the cursor

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: + fix auto-completion of exact matches + fix caret display in multiline input + improve how partially visible lines affect the scrollbar + remember docked state (use `gfx.dock(N)` to put in dock)

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: + fix formatting of zero-indexed table + fix formatting of zero-sized (yet non-empty) tables + override global 'print' function + use braces instead of non-lua brackets for tables with numeric indexes

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: fix drawing of multiline input after code execution

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: add Copy/Paste/Clear/Dock/Close actions to the right click context menu display errors using bold font document the built-in functions and variables in .help fix formatting of \t and \r in strings when they are followed by numbers implement (fix) display of empty lines remember window position, size and docked state store every return values in _ global variable

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: allow .clear to be recorded in the history do not crash on clipboard read/write failure (eg. 32-bit windows) don't evaluate command/actions while in a lua block implement !ACTION for Main actions, !!ACTION for MIDI Editor actions remove extra newline inserted when executing an empty command since v0.5

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: fix division by zero when wrapping lines starting with a zero-length character fix invisible \t (tabs) on windows fix ugly font on windows

reapack.name: js_Envelope LFO generator and shaper.lua
reapack.desc: js_Envelope LFO generator and shaper.lua

version.author: Xenakios (modded by juliansader)
version.changelog: + The MIDI editor version now available!! + Envelope area now resizeable (allowing finer resolution). + Alt-drag for quick delete of multiple nodes. + Accurate interpolation of Fast start, Fast end shapes. + Curve named "default" will be loaded on startup.

version.author: Xenakios (modded by juliansader)
version.changelog: + Mousewheel can be used for super fine adjustment of node values. + Rightclick in envelope area to set the LFO period to precise note lengths.

version.author: Xenakios (modded by juliansader)
version.changelog: + Mousewheel can be used for super fine adjustment of node values. + Rightclick in envelope area to set the LFO period to precise note lengths. + Envelope value displayed above hotpoint.

version.author: Xenakios (modded by juliansader)
version.changelog: + Changed interpolation between nodes from linear to parabolic.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Changed Rate interpolation between nodes from linear to parabolic.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Timebase: Beats option

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Points at edges of time selection will be preserved, to avoid affecting envelope outside time selection.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Fixed regression in handling of take envelopes.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Envelope outside time selection will be preserved by default, even if there are no pre-existing points at the edges of the time selection. + Leftclick only adds a single node point; Shift + Left-drag to add multiple points.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + Fixed regression in fade out. + Added "Reset curve" option in Save/Load menu. + Added optional display of hotpoint time position (in any of REAPER's time formats). + Improved sensitivity of nodes at edges of envelope drawing area.

version.author: Xenakios / juliansader
version.changelog: + User can specify the number of phase steps in standard LFO shapes, which allows nearly continuous phase changes.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Header info updated to ReaPack 1.1 format. + Keyboard shortcuts "a", "c" and "r" for quick switching between GUI views.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Fixed bug in loading default curves with customized names (different from "default").

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + GUI window will open at last-used screen position.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Compatible with automation items.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + LFO can be limited to time selection within automation item.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + LFO can be limited to time selection within automation item.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + LFO can be limited to time selection within automation item. + Undo points more informative.

reapack.name: js_LFO Tool (MIDI editor version, apply to existing CCs or velocities in lane under mouse).lua
reapack.desc: js_LFO Tool (MIDI editor version, apply to existing CCs or velocities in lane under mouse).lua

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Much faster execution in large takes with hundreds of thousands of events. + Keyboard shortcuts "a", "c" and "r" to switch GUI views. + LFO can be applied to existing events - including velocities - instead of inserting new CCs. + Requires REAPER v5.32 or later.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + First CC will be inserted at first tick within time selection, even if it does not fall on a beat, to ensure that the new LFO value is applied before any note is played.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + When default channel is changed, GUI will immediately update + WARNING: In REAPER v5.2x, the actions for changing the default channel for new events ("Set channel for new events to 1 [...16]") are buggy and may inappropriately activate the MIDI editor's event filter (as set in the Filter window). Changing the default channel via this script (or by running the actions directly) may therefore make some notes of CCs invisible.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + In REAPER itself, the aforementioned bug (setting channel for new events activates event filter) has been fixed in v2.54. + In the MIDI Inspector, the GUI will immediately update if the channel for new events is changed via the action list or via the MIDI editor's own new channel features.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + If user clicks in CC area, the script will ask whether all notes, text and sysex events should deselected before opening REAPER's Event Properties, to avoid opening the Note Properties or Text/Sysex windows instead. + New position formats: Ticks, and Measure:Beat:Ticks (the latter is similar to how the MIDI editor's Event Properties displays position).

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + In Measure:Beat:Ticks format, script will display fractional tick values if the MIDI item's ticks are not precisely aligned with the project beats. (As discussed in t=181211.)

reapack.name: js_Remove redundant CCs (from selected events in lane under mouse).lua
reapack.desc: js_Remove redundant CCs (from selected events in lane under mouse).lua

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + The "Remove Redundant CCs" script has several settings that the user can customize in the script's USER AREA. This is a version of the script with the following settings: + CC LANE: CCs will be removed from the lane that is under the mouse at the time the script is called (not from the last clicked lane). + SELECTION: Only selected CCs will be analyzed. Unselected CCs will be ignored. + MUTED: Muted CCs will automatically be removed since they are inherently redundant. + 14BIT CC LSB: When analyzing pitchwheel events, the LSB will be ignored.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + All the "lane under mouse" js_ scripts can now be linked to toolbar buttons and run using a single shortcut. + Description and instructions are included inside script - please read with REAPER's built-in script editor.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Workaround for "Add edge points" bug in REAPER that deletes timesig markers at insertion point.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Workaround for "Add edge points" bug in REAPER that deletes timesig markers at insertion point.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + MIDI items are not split. Instead MIDI is shifted inside item. Script is threfore useful in MIDI editor. + Tempo envelope is duplicated into empty space, so that inserted space is equal to selected time as well as selected beats. + Compatible with linear tempo changes. + User does not need to make any changes to timebase before or after running script. + Locked items can be protected against moving or splitting. + Empty space can be inserted either to the left or right of time selection (determined by edit cursor position).

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + MIDI notes that extend into but not beyond time selection, will not be extended.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: + Much faster execution in large projects.

version.changelog: New - When opening a context menu, context is now displayed in the title bar - Added a new button command: 'quit' - If the menu is in 'keep the window open' mode, any keypress will close it Fixes - 'close_time' has had its minimum value reduced to 1ms - Made the 'menu file not found' dialog a little clearer, hopefully - Menu background now extends all the way to the bottom of the window - 'Import menus' dialog now looks for .txt files rather than .lua - Fixed a crash when using F1 to highlight the context boxes in Setup

version.author: Lokasenna
version.changelog: New - Version number displayed below the radial menu, and in the Help tab - Will look for the example menus file if no user settings are found - Added an option to clear menu settings - Clearing and loading menu settings can optionally preserve your global settings

Lokasenna_Radial Menu - example settings.txt

version.author: Lokasenna
version.changelog: Important: - Selecting buttons in the Setup script changed from right-click to shift+click New: - Actions can be told to repeat as long as the mouse is held down (see Help) - Actions can be performed multiple times per click (see Help) - Repeating actions, mutliple actions, and midi actions can be used together (see Help) - Added ; as a new-line character in button labels, since not all keyboards have | Fixed: - Delay when clicking the same button rapidly - Realized I was updating the mouse state twice on every loop of the script

version.author: Lokasenna
version.changelog: New: - Option to open the window in a consistent location rather than at the mouse cursor. - When set to require the action key to be held down, displays an indicator at the top-left while trying to identify the key Fixed: - Deleting buttons from a menu would clear the center button as well - Lowered the time threshold for a double-click to 15ms; fixes issues with repeatedly clicking a button too quickly.
